name: ACX Audio Book Production

jv_history.source_quote:
Audiobook Cover

Interview with a #Vanlifer on
Audible https://www.audible.com/pd/Interview-... 
Amazon.com ... collaborate on an upcoming video? Let's connect: http://authoryourambition.com/partn

what_you_do: ACX (Audiobook Creation Exchange) is an all-in-one marketplace owned by Amazon/Audible that connects authors with narrators and studios to create, publish, and distribute audiobooks to Audible, Amazon, and iTunes.
who_you_serve: Independent authors, narrators, voice actors, studios, agents, and publishers looking to create and distribute audiobooks.
seeking: Authors seeking narrators/producers; narrators and studios seeking audiobook projects; agents and publishers seeking distribution.
offering: Marketplace platform connecting rights holders with producers, audiobook publishing and distribution to Audible/Amazon/iTunes, creator tools, royalty tracking dashboard, and marketing opportunities for indie creators.
social_proof: 339K+ titles published on ACX; 106B+ minutes of ACX content listened to in the last 5 years; operational since 2011.
audience_type: B2B and B2C (authors, narrators, studios, publishers)
business_focus: Connecting audiobook rights holders with professional narrators and studios to produce and distribute audiobooks globally.
service_provided: Audiobook marketplace, narrator/producer matching, audiobook publishing, distribution to Audible/Amazon/iTunes, royalty tracking, creator tools, marketing support
